title: Restful Central Khon Kaen Pullman Sanctuary
description:
A stylish haven in the heart of Khon Kaenâ€™s busy central business district, Pullman Khon Kaen Raja Orchid offers travellers a touch of sophistication. From its outdoor pool and tranquil LeSpa to delicious dining at the Pavilion Cafe Restaurant and Loong Yuen Chinese Restaurant, the Pullman Khon Kaen Raja Orchid ensures your city stay comes with all the creature comforts.

Each well-appointed room includes 24-hour room service, with ensuite bathroom with separate shower and bathtub, and LCD TV to help you unwind after a long day. With elegant classic design, your retreat from city life is a welcome slice of tranquillity.
offer_address: 9, 9 Prachasumran Road, Nai Mueang, Muang, Khon Kaen 40000, Thailand

vendor_name: Avani Khon Kaen Hotel & Convention Centre
title: Modern Thai Retreat in Bustling Kohn Kaen with Seven Restaurants & Bars
description: Feel the bustling energy of Khon Kaen, a lively city festooned with wonders and attractions, with an escape to Avani Khon Kaen Hotel & Convention Centre. One of the 'big four of Isan', the bustling city is a haven of activity - stumble on treasures at Walking Street Markets, savour local delicacies or let temples transport you through time. For those staying in, satiate your palate at one of the seven restaurants and bars, soak up the sun at the outdoor pool or sing your heart out at the karaoke venue.
location_description: Avani Khon Kaen Hotel & Convention Centre
offer_address: 999 Moo 4, Prachasamosorn Road, Khon Kaen 40000, Thailand
